constituent: assets, next, ice, lack, yawn, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: The first shells (money) you earn, you use to pay your debts. From then on, the next shells you accumulate become your assets.
hint: taking out a loan for a downpayment of a bigger loan
koohiiStory1: Assets are the next best thing to money.
koohiiStory2: The first SHELLS you get you obviously spend, but the NEXT SHELLS are your ASSETS, you should bury them in a low safe place (placement!).
myStory: các khoản tài sản cty. kế tiếp vỏ sò là tài sản
